body.content: Some times we ran into problems where we need some sort of uniuqe values in an array, removing duplicates values from an array could be a little bit tricky, so today we will discuss how to remove duplicates from an array.
There are several ways to remove duplicates from an array, but first of all we need to create an array with some duplicates items in it.

body.title: Define an array with some duplicates items in it.
body.content:
// array with some duplicates
const array = [1, 2, 4, 4, 2, 5, 6, 7, 9, 9]
So, to remove the duplicates, we can use one of the following methods:
The goal here is to create a Set with the array data we have, and then create an array with the values of the Set.
Since the Set only keeps unique values, we can use the Set object to create an array with the unique values, so the Set will remove the duplicates for us.

body.title: Create a Set with the array data.
